title: Kayn isnt in the champion pool on the website!
body:
Just noticed you guys havent added Kayn to the champ pool at http://gameinfo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/champions/  
I really wanted an in depth look at his stats and instead had to go to some third party scum website (Booo!) 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} 

Sorry if this wasnt the right place to put this but its not exactly a bug so I didnt want to put it into the bugs forum :) Cheers!

replies.body: No worries, we don't exactly have a section dedicated to fixed issues across our websites. I'll do my best to pass this along!
Thanks Broporo! Knew we could count on you!
Urgot also hasn't been updated on the list, it still shows old Urgot there.

It's because that champion list is outdated thanks to the release of Universe, Riot seems to have put all the effort into keeping Universe updated and forgotten about the actual old champion pages which show ingame details rather than lore and artwork. If you notice, not even Rakan and Xayah are up there.
